title: Dow loses 200 points, Nasdaq drops 2% as investors fear Fed rate hikes will slow the economy - CNBC
content: Dow loses 200 points, Nasdaq drops 2% as investors fear Fed rate hikes will slow the economy  CNBC
description: Stocks fell on Tuesday as Federal Reserve Governor Lael Brainard indicated the central bank could take a more aggressive approach to its tightening policy.
